text:
At the beginning of your practice and review, or after taking a Practice Exam or two, you
can benefit from our 101 Must Knows for the Level I CFA exam. There are 101 online
questions but it is not a test, you can attempt them at any pace. Each question includes
a multimedia tutorial with a targeted review of the underlying definitions, concepts, and
techniques from the curriculum necessary to answer the question. Some are short and
some are quite detailed, but all cover material that we believe is crucial to exam success.
